Articles.Content:
I was just wondering, has anyone heard a song, that is a parody of a big song, but the parody is based around KSP? Like, Well Minecraft has things like "Screw the Nether", and "How Do I Craft This Again?"

as well as other songs, but I was wondering if anyone has heard of KSP songs like that, Though I admit, I just got one in my head, and I think it would go rather well if I could get all the lyrics in my head out on paper once I figure it out. But yes, Anyone hear of songs like that? Just curious.

Well, I haven't heard a parody, but after buying a music CD, I got the urge to write KSP lyrics to Lita Ford's "Kiss Me Deadly". Introducing "Stage Me Deadly". It was quite convenient that "pretty baby" has the same number of syllables as "Jebediah". With apologies to Ford and Squad:

Stage Me Deadly

I went to the VAB last Saturday night

It didn't get made, no design's in sight

Uh, huh

It ain't no big thing

Late for the window and 'lignment was bad

Had to wait four orbits to get to Laythe

Uh, huh

It ain't no big thing

I went to the Mun last Saturday night

I showed you screenshots, you'll watch all night

Uh, huh

It ain't no big thing

But I know what I like

I know I like launchin' with you

And I know what you like

I know you like launchin' with me

Yeah, yeah

Stage me once

Stage me twice

Come one Jebediah

Stage me deadly

Added some boosters, gettin' high

Sittin', watchin' the stars go by

Uh, huh

It ain't no big thing

Science to do but no gravity

Lookin' at Minmus don't get it for me

Uh, huh

It ain't no big thing

But I know what I like

I know I like launchin' with you

And I know what you like

I know you like launchin' with me

Yeah, yeah

Stage me once

Stage me twice

Come one Jebediah

Stage me deadly

Stage me once

Stage me twice

Come one Jebediah

Stage me deadly

You know I like launchin' with you

Launchin' with you

Come on

Stage me once

Stage me twice

Come one Jebediah

Stage me deadly

Stage me once

Stage me twice

Come one Jebediah

Stage me

Come one Jebediah

Stage me

Come one Jebediah

Stage me deadly

^I'd spoiler this if they had ever fixed the security hole with them

In terms of actual parodies that have caught on, the only one I'm familiar with is (unfortunately) not for KSP but for FIRST Robotics and is

.

Hmm...I have some titles

I've got the moves like Jeb (Moves like Jagger)

Kerbal Style(gangnam style)

Fly it maybe(call me maybe)

What does the pilot say (what does the fox say)

Party on the KSS (party in the USA)

Rolling on the mun (rolling in the deep)

This ship is on fire (this girl is on fire)

I havn't heard any actual KSP parodies.

I fell into a burning star of fire,

I went down, down, down, and the flares went higher,

And it burns, burns, burns in the burning star of fire

Star of fire

-Johnny Kash, "Burning Star of Fire," written during his sundive
No one has done a KSP boom de ya da yet?

Wow, i was just about to start this thread.

But anyways, my best title would probably be "Docking In The Dark"

I fell into a burning star of fire,

I went down, down, down, and the flares went higher,

And it burns, burns, burns in the burning star of fire

Star of fire

-Johnny Kash, "Burning Star of Fire," written during his sundive

The original lyrics can apply when you are de-orbiting a gravity wheel... it looks awesome when you do.

Ground control to Major Jeb

Ground control to Major Jeb

Eat your batch of snacks and OVER-THR

Ground control to Major Jeb

Commencing load screen ASAS on

Floppy boosters, really do look like trashcans...

You guys take it from here.

"Come fly with me, let's fly, let's fly <boom!>"

Come Fly with Me, Frank Sinatra

Yeah, Sinatra: Ã‚Â´Fly me to the mun and back...Ã‚Â´

EDIT: IDEA: Maybe, in some later update, we could have at least some kerbals play their Ã‚Â´favorite songÃ‚Â´ during launch? You know, like Jeb would take off with RockÃ‚Â´nÃ‚Â´Roll or whatnot. Of course this should be moddable, so that you could make your own Ã‚Â´crowdÃ‚Â´ (say all your friends) into kerbals with the kerbalizer and give them all their fav-songs.

Edited October 16, 2013 by Mr. Scruffy

'Fly me to the Mun' by Frank Kerman.

(Original by Mr. Sinatra).

Damn Mr. Scruffy!
In some thread, someone (Whackjob I think?) redid the lyrics of Still Alive (Portal) for KSP. I sadly neither remember the lyrics nor the thread, but it was awesome.

fly me to the mun

let me play with my kerbal

let me see what spring is like

on Jool, Minmus and Vall

in other words, land my probe

in other words, baby launch me

fill my craft with fuel

and let me fly forever more

space is all i long for

all i worship and adore

in other words, please stay cool

in other words, now i launch you
My god, someone should have done a Taylor Swift 22 parody for the .22 release.

Not KSP, but space relevant

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4KnFwjQtGV0

I made a song like a few months ago, it was a parody of "I'm Sexy and I know it" I changed it to "I'm Kerbal and I know it"

It was the first parody I ever saw and I got around 500 views
10/10 - Take all my rep!
Really not about KSP the game itself, much better off in The Space Lounge.
We need some variety in general other than "Where's .22?!"

Burnin' Alive

(Parody of Stayin' Alive by the Bee Gees)

Well, you can tell by the way I use my walk

I'm a Kerbonaut, no time to talk

Rockets loud and Capsules warm

I've been knocked around since I was born

But now it's all right, that's okay

You may look the other way

We can try to understand

The Kerbal Devs' effect on man

Whether you're a pilot or whether you're mechanic

You're burnin' alive, burnin' alive

Feel the struts a-breakin' and everybody shakin'

I'm a-burnin' alive, burnin' alive

Ah, ah, ah, ah, burnin' alive, burnin' alive

Ah, ah, ah, ah, burnin' ali-i-i-i-ive

Oh, when you walk

Well, now I crash low and I fly high

And if I can't do either, I really try

Got wings of steel, they're on my tanks

I'm a screamin' man, and my mind's a blank

You know, it's all right, it's okay

I'll live to see another day

We can try to understand

The Kerbal Devs' effect on man

Whether you're a pilot or whether you're mechanic

You're burnin' alive, burnin' alive

Feel the struts a-breakin' and everybody shakin'

I'm a-burnin' alive, burnin' alive

Ah, ah, ah, ah, burnin' alive, burnin' alive

Ah, ah, ah, ah, burnin' ali-i-i-i-ive

Rover's goin' nowhere, somebody help me

Somebody help me, yeah

Rover's goin' nowhere, somebody help me, yeah

I'm burnin' alive

Well, you can tell by the way I use my walk

I'm a Kerbonaut, no time to talk

Rockets loud and Capsules warm

I've been knocked around since I was born

But now it's all right, that's okay

You may look the other way

We can try to understand

The Kerbal Devs' effect on man

Whether you're a pilot or whether you're mechanic

You're burnin' alive, burnin' alive

Feel the struts a-breakin' and everybody shakin'

I'm a-burnin' alive, burnin' alive

Ah, ah, ah, ah, burnin' alive, burnin' alive

Ah, ah, ah, ah, burnin' ali-i-i-i-ive

Yeah

Rock's goin' nowhere, somebody help me

Somebody help me, yeah

Rock's goin' nowhere, somebody help me, yeah

I'm burnin' ali-i-i-i-ive

Rock's goin' nowhere, somebody help me

Somebody help me, yeah

Rock's goin' nowhere, somebody help me, yeah

I'm burnin' ali-i-i-i-ive

Rock's goin' nowhere, somebody help me

Somebody help me, yeah

Rock's goin' nowhere, somebody help me, yeah

I'm burnin' ali-i-i-i-ive

Rock's goin' nowhere, somebody help me

Somebody help me, yeah

Rock's goin' nowhere, somebody help me, yeah

I'm burnin' ali-i-i-i-ive

*"Rock's in the final 4 parts is intended to be a shortening of rocket.*

Edited October 16, 2013 by Flymetothemun

to dress up like ker-bals,

And launch our rockets, uh oh, oh no,

It feels like a perfect night,

to stay up till midnight,

to wait for the update, uh uh, uh uh

Yeah,

It's wonderful; unbearable, oh yea-eah,

Tonight's the night we reach the deadline, it's time..

Oh-oh,

But I can't wait for .22,

For science and mystery goo,

Just don't eat it - ew!

You don't know about me,

but I want .22,

Everything will be alright if we just stay up for .22, .22,

It seems like one of those nights,

I want that update,

Refreshing steam all day, uh uh, uh uh

No one has done a KSP boom de ya da yet?

I love Ike's mountains,

I love Eve's purple skies,

I love big rockets,

I love when Kerbals fly!

I love the whole game,

And all its explosions!

Boom de yada, boom de yada, boom de yada, boom de yada!

I love Laythe's oceans,

I love flapping wings,

I love to go fast!

I love collapsing things!

I love the Kerbals,

And all their craziness!

Boom de yada, boom de yada, boom de yada, boom de yada!

I love shock heating,

I love NERVA burns,

I love big boosters!

I love gravity turns!

I love the kerbal-verse,

It's such a funny place!

Boom de yada, boom de yada, boom de yada, boom de yada!

Boom de yada, boom de yada, boom de yada, boom de yada!
